gui.ScreenRecord.ScreenRecorder¶

class gui.ScreenRecord.ScreenRecorder(filename=None, display_stdout=False, framerate=30, encrypt=False, password='default', output_folder='./screen_recordings', file_type='.mp4')¶

Bases: object

Utilizes FFMPEG to record the entire desktop screen. Also allows for setting of output filepath and password protected encrypting of files.

Parameters

  • filename (String, optional) – custom filepath of output file. Defaults to None

  • display_stdout (boolean, optional) – if true prints out ffmpeg execution to terminal, if false hides it. Defaults to False.

  • framerate (int, optional) – the framerate at which to record. Defaults to 30

  • encrypt (boolean, optional) – if true turns on file encryption. Defaults to False

  • password (String. optional) – the password of encrypted files. Defaults to ‘default’

  • output_folder (String, optional) – the folder to which files will be saved. Defaults to ‘./screen_recordings’

  • file_type (String, optional) – the file type of the recordings. Defaults to ‘.mp4’

__init__(filename=None, display_stdout=False, framerate=30, encrypt=False, password='default', output_folder='./screen_recordings', file_type='.mp4')¶

Encrypts the a file with password protection.

Changes the output file name.

FFMPEG desktop recording as a subprocess in the background.

stopRecording()

Stops the ffmpeg screen recording process.
encryptFile(filename)¶

Encrypts the a file with password protection. Does so by placing it into a zip folder

Parameters

filename (String) – the file path of the file to encrypt

generateFilepath()¶

Generates a filename based on the the current date time

Returns

the generated filepath

Return type

String

isRecording()¶

Checks if currently recording

Returns

true if recording, false otherwise

Return type

boolean

setFilename(name)¶

Changes the output file name. NOT the output folder

Parameters

name (String) – the new name

setOutputFolder(path)¶

Changed the output folder of recordings

Parameters

path (String) – the path of the new output folder

setPassword(password)¶

Sets the password to encrypt files with. DOES NOT change password of previously encrypted files

Parameters

password (String) – the new password

startRecording()¶

FFMPEG desktop recording as a subprocess in the background.

stopRecording()¶

Stops the ffmpeg screen recording process. If file encryptions is on the file will be encrypted then the unencrypted file will be deleted.
